quote: People become stronger because they have memories they can't forget.
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I'll leave my broker's mark on the world.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: Don't underestimate me! I don't quit that easy!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: Believe in yourself. Not in the you who believes in me. Not the me who believes in you. Believe in the you who believes in yourself.
author: Kamina

quote: I don't want to be afraid. I don't want to run away anymore.
author: Mikasa Ackerman

quote: I'm going to become the greatest sorcerer in the world!
author: Natsu Dragneel

quote: The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can...that's what makes it so damn beautiful.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: A true man never dies, even when he's killed!
author: Kamina

quote: It's just pathetic to get jealous over someone's strength.
author: Vegeta

quote: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: People's lives don't end when they die, it ends when they lose their wills to live.
author: Armin Arlert

quote: I don't have enough chakra to defeat you. So I'll just have to beat some into you!
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: It's a cruel world, but it's also very beautiful.
author: Shizuo Heiwajima

quote: Even if you can't take another step, keep going. Because the next one will be the best one.
author: Yami Yugi

quote: I made a promise to protect your smile.
author: Eren Yeager

quote: The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I'm not going there to die. I'm going to find out what being really alive is!
author: Eren Yeager

quote: If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
author: Naruto Uzumaki

quote: I won't let myself be consumed by hatred anymore.
author: Sasuke Uchiha

quote: Fear is freedom! Subjugation is liberation! Contradiction is truth!
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: The world isn't separated into good and bad. There are as many sides as there are people.
author: Rikiya Koyama

quote: The longer you live, the more you realize that reality is just made of pain, suffering, and emptiness.
author: Madara Uchiha

quote: If you want to keep a secret, you must also hide it from yourself.
author: Ren Amamiya

quote: If you lose, you die. If you win, you live. If you don't fight, you can't win!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: I refuse to step backwards even one single step. I'll keep walking forward.
author: Izuku Midoriya

quote: It's better to be a crybaby than to have a heart of steel.
author: Nico Robin

quote: The world is not perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
author: Roy Mustang

quote: The only one who can defeat me is me.
author: Meliodas

quote: I'll make my own path. A path with no regrets.
author: Todoroki Shoto

quote: A place to belong is a luxury I could never afford.
author: Akame

quote: I'm not gonna die alone. I won't let my dream end!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: The only time a guy can be brave is when he's afraid.
author: Guts

quote: I won't let anyone else get hurt because of me.
author: Izuku Midoriya

quote: Because I was so kind, everyone left.
author: Ryuk

quote: The only thing we're allowed to believe in, is ourselves.
author: Eren Yeager

quote: If you want to win, you have to risk it all.
author: Shiro

quote: People's lives don't end when they die, it ends when they lose their wills to live.
author: Armin Arlert

quote: I don't have any reason to live... but I was born, so I'll live.
author: Kazuma Kiryu

quote: You only live once. If you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae Hughes

quote: When do you think people die? When they are shot through the heart by the bullet of a pistol? No. When they are ravaged by an incurable disease? No. It's when they lose their willpower.
author: Ichirou Yamaki

quote: The world won't change for you, you have to change the world.
author: Motoko Kusanagi

quote: No matter how many times you get knocked down, you have to keep getting up.
author: Izuku Midoriya

quote: Giving up doesn't mean I'm a loser, it just means I'm lazy.
author: Shikamaru Nara

quote: If you think a dream is over, just open your eyes and make a new one.
author: Taichi Yaegashi

quote: The sadness you feel is proof that you were happy once.
author: Spike Spiegel

quote: If you keep running away, you'll never be able to find the answer.
author: Tanjiro Kamado

quote: It's better to be a loser who keeps trying than a genius who never tries.
author: Korosensei

quote: People become stronger because they have memories they can't forget.
author: Tsunayoshi Sawada

quote: The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
author: Lelouch Lamperouge

quote: I won't hesitate anymore. That's how I'll stay alive.
author: Izuku Midoriya

quote: Even if you hit the bottom, there's always a way back up.
author: Yusuke Urameshi

quote: The world is indeed full of pain. But it's also overflowing with warmth.
author: Simon

quote: Nothing's ever accomplished by giving up.
author: Kurapika

quote: The world is cruel, but also very beautiful.
author: Mikasa Ackerman

quote: When you hit the bottom, the only way to go is up.
author: Saitama

quote: If you don't take risks, you can't create a future!
author: Monkey D. Luffy
